en.title: About me
en.name: Balazs Bencs
en.description: Experienced Web Programmer with a demonstrated history of working in the education management industry. Skilled in Network Administration, Moodle, SQL, PHP, JAVA, HTML5, CSS4 NodeJs, Angular, Drupal and WordPress. Strong information technology professional with a Bachelor of Science (BSc) focused in System Programming, Networking, and LAN/WAN Management/Manager from College of Dunaújváros. Currently working at IBM.
en.contactButtonText: What can I do for you?
